body_html:
@sn2234 I believe that the check failure of GetConvolveAlgorithms() is not the root cause. I think the first error CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED indicates that cudnn is not correctly installed or loaded. I think GetConvolveAlgorithms() failed simply because cudnn is not there to provide the algorithm enums.
To find out the root cause of CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED, could you provide more info as how you installed TensorFlow and CUDA/cudnn? Also your hardware info too. Thanks!

body:
@sn2234 I believe that the check failure of GetConvolveAlgorithms() is not the root cause. I think the first error CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED indicates that cudnn is not correctly installed or loaded. I think GetConvolveAlgorithms() failed simply because cudnn is not there to provide the algorithm enums.
To find out the root cause of CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED, could you provide more info as how you installed TensorFlow and CUDA/cudnn? Also your hardware info too. Thanks!
